p: For ten randomly selected samples from the cohort, RT-LAMP detected RABV from each sample with a similar banding pattern to the positive control when separated by agarose gel electrophoresis ( Figure 5) or when biotinylated products were applied to a LFD ( Figure 6). This group comprised three Africa 2 and seven Africa 1 viruses ( Table S1). The cost of this assay was calculated at approximately $3 per assay.
